welcome.greeting: Welcome to my interactive portfolio! I'd be glad to share more about my work and experience with you. May I know your name?
welcome.niceMeet: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! Are you a recruiter, potential client, or looking to collaborate?

categories.selectPrompt: Great! Here are some questions you might have. Feel free to explore any that interest you:

actions.thanksMessage: Thanks for exploring my portfolio! Feel free to restart or reach out anytime.
actions.anotherQuestion: Would you like to explore another question?
actions.allExplored: You've explored all the questions! Would you like to start over or check out my work?

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate designer and developer creating meaningful digital experiences.

experience.title: 5+ Years Experience
experience.description: Working across healthcare, banking, government, and e-commerce sectors with diverse teams and technologies.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between design and development, creating intuitive interfaces that users love.

passion.title: What I Love
passion.description: Exploring new technologies, solving complex problems, and bringing creative ideas to life through code.

about.longDescription1: With over 12+ years of experience in web development and design, I've worked on projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale applications. My approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving to deliver solutions that not only look great but perform exceptionally well.
about.longDescription2: I'm passionate about creating accessible, user-friendly interfaces that provide seamless experiences across all devices. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or experimenting with emerging technologies.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and creative solutions

items.title: HR Management Dashboard
items.description: A comprehensive HR solution built with Next.js and Shadcn UI, featuring employee management, attendance tracking, and performance analytics.

items.title: Healthcare Regulatory Portal
items.description: Government health regulatory platform with license management, inspection scheduling, and compliance tracking for healthcare facilities.

items.title: Booking & Appointment System
items.description: Real-time booking platform with calendar integration, automated reminders, and payment processing for service-based businesses.

items.title: E-commerce Fashion Store
items.description: Modern online store with product catalog, shopping cart, wishlist, and secure checkout with multiple payment options.

items.title: Military Digital Solutions
items.description: Secure digital platform for military operations including personnel management, equipment tracking, and mission planning.

items.title: Social Media Analytics
items.description: Analytics dashboard for social media managers with real-time metrics, engagement tracking, and automated reporting.

items.title: Banking Mobile App
items.description: Secure mobile banking application with account management, transfers, bill payments, and investment tracking.

items.title: Creative Agency Portfolio
items.description: Stunning portfolio website for a creative agency showcasing their work with smooth animations and interactive elements.

items.title: Attendance Management System
items.description: Government attendance system with biometric integration, real-time tracking, leave management, and comprehensive reporting.

experience.title: Changelog from My Journey
experience.subtitle: A timeline of my professional growth and key milestones

timeline.title: Senior UI/UX Designer & Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Leading design and development initiatives for innovative digital products, focusing on user-centered design and modern web technologies.
achievements: Built 15+ production-ready web applications using Next.js and React
Established design system and component library used across multiple projects
Mentored junior designers and developers in best practices

timeline.title: UI/UX Designer & Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Designed and developed critical government portals including healthcare regulatory systems, military solutions, and attendance management platforms.
achievements: Delivered healthcare regulatory portal serving 500+ facilities
Implemented biometric attendance system for 10,000+ government employees
Achieved 98% user satisfaction rating on military digital solutions

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Developed secure banking applications and financial dashboards with focus on performance, security, and user experience.
achievements: Built mobile banking app with 50,000+ active users
Reduced page load time by 60% through optimization
Implemented secure authentication with biometric integration

timeline.title: UI/UX Designer
timeline.description: Created compelling brand identities and user interfaces for diverse clients across e-commerce, healthcare, and service industries.
achievements: Designed 30+ brand identities and style guides
Increased client conversion rates by average of 40%
Won 'Best UI Design' award at regional design competition

timeline.title: Junior Designer & Developer
timeline.description: Started my journey in web design and development, building websites for small businesses and continuously learning new technologies.
achievements: Mastered HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design
Built personal portfolio that attracted first agency job

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

recruiter.question: What is your expertise?
recruiter.answer: I specialize in UI/UX Design & Front-end Development, with hands-on experience in Next.js, Vite, Angular, React, Shadcn UI, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, along with creative tools like Figma, Sketch, Adobe Suite, and AI Prompting.

recruiter.question: What industries have you worked in?
recruiter.answer: I've designed and developed solutions for Healthcare, Banking, Social Apps, HR Solutions, Government & Military domains, Booking systems, Service portals, E-commerce, and Creative Branding projects.

recruiter.question: Do you have experience with collaborative projects?
recruiter.answer: Yes. I've worked in design agencies, startups, and government regulators, collaborating closely with developers, analysts, product owners, and stakeholders.

recruiter.question: What are your core skills?
recruiter.answer: My key strengths include UI/UX Design, Branding, Front-end Development, Interactive Prototyping, Responsive Layouts, Component Libraries, and CMS Websites.

recruiter.question: Can you share some main projects?
recruiter.answer: A few highlights: HR Management Dashboard (Next.js + Shadcn), Booking & Appointment System, Government Health Regulatory Portal, Government Attendance System with Live Actions, Police & Military Digital Solutions, E-commerce & Business Websites, Interactive Landing Pages & Personal Portfolio.

recruiter.question: How can I contact you?
recruiter.answer: You can reach me via my Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, Email, or WhatsApp. I'm also happy to share my CV upon request.

client.question: What services do you provide?
client.answer: I help businesses with UI/UX design, prototyping, branding, and front-end development to turn concepts into functional, user-friendly products.

client.question: Can you customize dashboards or booking systems?
client.answer: Absolutely. I create custom dashboards, booking platforms, attendance portals, and workflow tools tailored to your business needs.

client.question: Do you also work with branding and identity?
client.answer: Yes. I provide branding, logo design, and UI style guides, ensuring your product identity aligns with your audience.

client.question: What's your design and development process?
client.answer: My workflow: Requirements & Research ‚Üí Wireframes ‚Üí Figma Prototypes / Branding Concepts ‚Üí Front-end Build (Next.js / Shadcn / TailwindCSS).

client.question: Do you work on XR/AR/VR projects?
client.answer: Yes! I have explored XR (AR/VR/MR) and plan to feature more immersive experiences in my portfolio.

client.question: How can we start working together?
client.answer: Reach me via Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, or WhatsApp. I'm open to freelance, contract, or project-based work.

collaborator.question: What's your tech stack?
collaborator.answer: I mainly use Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion, and design tools like Figma & Adobe Suite.

collaborator.question: Do you work on open-source or side projects?
collaborator.answer: Yes! I enjoy building tools, UI kits, dashboards, and experimental portfolio projects.

collaborator.question: Are you involved in any startups?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm part of Mouzee.Tech, a startup team focused on digital products, UI/UX design, and branding.

collaborator.question: What skills do you bring to a team?
collaborator.answer: I bridge the design-to-code gap, offering UI/UX prototyping, front-end coding, and creative branding.

collaborator.question: Do you collaborate remotely?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm flexible with remote collaboration, async workflows, and modern team tools.

collaborator.question: Where can I connect with you?
collaborator.answer: Let's connect via Portfolio Website, GitHub, or LinkedIn. I'm always open to interesting collaborations!
